1.title: Do I need previous martial arts experience?
1.text: No, our school is welcoming both beginners and more advanced students.

2.title: Is it suitable for both kids and adults?
2.text: Yes, we have different kids classes (various age groups also) and the adults train with us as well.

3.title: What do I need to bring with me for the first class?
3.text: Normally we train in white pants that are called “abada” and a comfortable t-shirt. However, you can use whatever sports clothes you prefer. We also train barefoot.

4.title: Do you have any events besides regular trainings?
4.text: Yes, we do our best to make capoeira community as interesting as possible. Therefore, we organise training camps, seminars, bonding activities and much more!
